title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        New Hours  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, New Hours  New park hours are now in effect, opening at 9:00 a.m. (instead of 8:30), closing time remains at 5:00 p.m.     Information        Some pull off areas temporarily closed beginning Aug. 15  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Some pull off areas temporarily closed beginning Aug. 15  Some pull off areas along Hwy. 24 are being repaved beginning Aug. 15 and will result in some temporary closures.  The areas impacted will be: Grant's Headquarters and Lee's Headquarters, but NOT the main parking lot.
